message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a 60/40 split. This way, I get a bit more since I made the first offer. Would you agree to this split?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your proposal and understand your perspective. However, with each additional round the total value decreases for me, so Iâ€™d like to avoid further delays. I propose a split where I receive $55 and you get $45. I believe this is a fair division given the circumstances, and I hope you agree to this prompt resolution.

Hi Bob, I'm willing to adjust my offer to 52/48 in your favor, considering the inflation impacts us both differently. This seems like a reasonable adjustment to maximize our mutual benefits as time progresses. Hope you agree!
